name: MidMarket Community Benefit District
description: To dispatch cleaning, maintenance or safety services, 7am to 7pm, 7 days a week: Call (415) 543.5223 or email dispatch@midmarketcbd.org For information on MMCBD projects and services call the Office (415) 957-5985 or Email info@midmarketcbd.org. The MMCBD strives to improve the overall cleanliness and safety of the district with the goal of increasing pedestrian activity, strengthening existing small businesses and cultural institutions, attracting new investment, and improving quality of life.
